columns = ['Time', 'User', 'Tweet']
data = []
for tweet in public_tweets:
    data.append([tweet.created_at, tweet.user.screen_name, tweet.text])

df = pd.DataFrame(data, columns=columns)

df.to_csv('tweets.csv')
